title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Citrix Vulnerabilities

meta.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Citrix Vulnerabilities

chapters.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Citrix Vulnerabilities

sentences.text: Citrix XenMobile Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.
sentences.html: Citrix XenMobile Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

sentences.text: Citrix XenMobile Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.
sentences.html: Citrix XenMobile Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

sentences.text: Citrix XenMobile Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.
sentences.html: Citrix XenMobile Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a command injection flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

sentences.text: Citrix StoreFront Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when configured to use SAML authentication. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.
sentences.html: Citrix StoreFront Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when configured to use SAML authentication. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim’s Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim’s cookie-based authentication credentials.

sentences.text: Citrix SD-WAN could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by the use of hard-coded credentials. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SD-WAN CLI to gain access to the shell.
sentences.html: Citrix SD-WAN could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by the use of hard-coded credentials. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SD-WAN CLI to gain access to the shell.

sentences.text: Citrix SD-WAN is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.

A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim’s Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim’s cookie-based authentication credentials.
